category: Korean University Sports Committee Regulations/Article 6 (Types and Number of Officers)
contents: Article 6 (Types and number of officers) The following officers shall be appointed to the Committee. 1. 1 chairperson 2. Up to 3 vice chairpersons *3. 1 honorary secretary 4. Up to 12 standing members (including vice-chairman and honorary secretary) [This article was newly established on May 15, 2017]
